column1: The following organizations are good resources for information on hearing impairment or speech impairment: - Alexander Graham Bell Association for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing -- www.agbell.org - American Speech-Language-Hearing Association -- www.asha.org/public - Center for Parent Information and Resources -- www.parentcenterhub.org - National Institute on Deafness and Other Communication Disorders -- www.nidcd.nih.gov - U.S.
